casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Matthew LOWE. No. 278PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 20, 2016. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Lowe, David Matthew. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of April 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of April 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 9th day of May 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
